(a)
Review Process. GSA Office of Acquisition Policy is responsible for monitoring and reporting sustainable acquisition activity to the GSA Chief Sustainability Officer in support of the agency’s semiannual status report to Office of Management and Budget. This semiannual audit covers only applicable contract actions as defined in GSAM 523.103. This review will utilize existing GSA databases and processes to the maximum extent practicable in order to limit manual data collection. These reviews will focus on ensuring that GSA requires and receives sustainable products and services in all applicable acquisitions.

(b)
Determining Compliance. See the GSA Sustainable Acquisition Review Criteria document at http://insite.gsa.gov/sustainableacquisitionfor the specific criteria that will be used to determine compliance with sustainable acquisition reviews.
